name: Comforting Chicken Noodle Soup
ingredients: 6 ½ cups uncooked wide egg noodles 2 cans cream of chicken soup
3 cups cubed cooked chicken 1 cup sour cream
steps: In a large saucepan, bring water and bouillon to a boil. Add noodles; cook, uncovered, until
tender, about 10 minutes. Do not drain. Add soup and chicken; heat through.
Remove from heat, stir in sour cream. Sprinkle with parsely.
